description: TestResult is the result of a single test. Only one of the fields will be set.

^(compilationError)$.description: compilation_error is the error if the test failed due to compilation errors.

^(runtimeError)$.description: runtime_error is the error if the test failed due to runtime errors.

^(unexpectedError)$.description: unexpected_error is any other error that may have occurred.

^(validationError)$.description: validation_error is the error if the test failed due to validation errors.

compilation_error.description: compilation_error is the error if the test failed due to compilation errors.

runtime_error.description: runtime_error is the error if the test failed due to runtime errors.

success.description: success is true if the test succeeded.

unexpected_error.description: unexpected_error is any other error that may have occurred.

validation_error.description: validation_error is the error if the test failed due to validation errors.

title: Test Result
